Android IS Linux. If you want to remove commercial/spyware android, then you have two options:

1- Ubuntu. Such as Ubuntu Touch.
You can buy phones with Ubuntu Touch already installed on them:https://ubports.com/devices/promoted-devices

2- ASOP (Android Open Source Project). Such as LineageOS, Resurrection Remix.
2.1- LineageOS: https://lineageos.org/
2.2: Resurrection Remix: https://resurrectionremix.com/

You can install these OS yourself on some specific models. My favorite is Ubuntu Touch, because it is a real Ubuntu, just on a phone. It doesn't even feel like a phone anymore. I've used plenty of ASOP. Such as Resurrection Remix, which is excellent. No more Google bloatware.

3- If you want a secure phone out of the box, there are plenty of options, and by definition none of them will run anything Google.
3.1- Bittium: https://toughmobile2.bittium.com/c/	
3.2- Librem 5: https://puri.sm/products/librem-5/
3.3- Blackphone: https://www.blackphone.co.uk/
3.4- XOR: https://xorinc.uk/app/pages/home
3.5- ClearPhone: https://www.clearcellular.org/clearphone
